treatment-md.title: Solanum humblotii Dammer, Bot. Jahrb. Syst. 38: 184. 1906
treatment-md.article-title: A revision of the " African Non-Spiny " Clade of Solanum L. (Solanum sections Afrosolanum Bitter, Benderianum Bitter, Lemurisolanum Bitter, Lyciosolanum Bitter, Macronesiotes Bitter, and Quadrangulare Bitter: Solanaceae)
